title: Application designer and developer
description: In this school, I learn the bases to make an app and manage a team.
During this year, we had to make project in a group of 3 people.
We chose to use the Scrum management technic and each week the Scrum master changed.
During this year, we mainly learned how to plan a project by doing technical specifications, mockups and schedule.

title: IT Developer
description: I've learn basics of some langagues such as DotNet, GoLang, C++, and few lessons of PHP with Laravel.
We made a couple of project like:
Create and host a Wordpress server on Debian using VMWare
Create a Weather Station using an Arduino and create a dashboard using Laravel to read the datas
Create a mobile app using Flutter and link this app to a web api using SocketIO and REST
Create a website for a dummy company including a shopping cart system
Create a tracking app using Javascript to track a robot position
